channel.title: Structural Equation Modeling on mcstatistics
channel.description: Recent content in Structural Equation Modeling on mcstatistics

item.title: Structural Equation Modeling: A Short Introduction
item.description: Introduction & Advantages Latent Variables Simultaneous Estimation Identification Fit Indices \(\chi^2\)-Test CFI - Comparative Fit Index RMSEA - Root Mean Square Error of Approximation SRMR - Standardized Root Mean Square Residual Model Optimization References Introduction & Advantages There are a lot of variations regarding Structural Equation Modeling (SEM). Therefore, this article is focusing on the basics of SEM. Fundamentally, SEM can be classified as a combination of path analysis and confirmatory factor analysis.
